hero.headline: Alexandra Reeves

members.name: Alexandra Reeves
members.title: Licensed Real Estate Salesperson

members.bio: Specializes in first-time buyers and relocation clients. Former architect with exceptional eye for property potential.
members.name: Marcus Chen
members.title: Buyer's Agent

members.bio: Manages all listing preparations, professional photography scheduling, and marketing materials production.
members.name: Diana Rosario
members.title: Listing Coordinator

blocks.body: I didn't plan to become a real estate agent — I fell into it after helping a close friend navigate an incredibly complicated purchase in Scarsdale 18 years ago. What I discovered was a profession that combined everything I love: people, strategy, local community, and the satisfaction of helping families find their place in the world. Since then, I've closed over 500 transactions and $150M in career sales — but the number that matters most to me is the 500 families who trusted me with their biggest financial decision.

I grew up in Westchester County and raised my own family here. That's not just background — it's expertise. I know which streets flood in spring, which school districts have exceptional arts programs, which neighborhoods are quietly appreciating, and which local lenders will actually get your deal to close on time. That knowledge only comes from living here, and it's the single most valuable thing I bring to every transaction.

My philosophy is simple: I treat every client the way I'd want to be treated. I pick up the phone. I tell you the truth about pricing, even when it's not what you want to hear. I stay in your corner through every obstacle, and I don't celebrate until you do. That commitment to genuine service is why over 80% of my business comes from referrals and repeat clients.

brokerage.name: Compass
brokerage.description: Alexandra Reeves is a licensed real estate salesperson affiliated with Compass, a licensed real estate broker and abides by Equal Housing Opportunity laws. All material presented herein is intended for informational purposes only.

community.body: Westchester County has given my family so much, and giving back is a responsibility I take seriously. I serve on the board of the Westchester Land Trust, volunteer with Habitat for Humanity's local chapter, and sponsor the annual Scarsdale Youth Soccer League. Real estate isn't just transactions — it's the fabric of our community, and I'm proud to help weave it together.
